title: Metadata Settings
description: Configure how metadata is retrieved, stored, and matched for your books, including provider settings and field preferences.

autoDownload.warning: When enabled, metadata will be automatically retrieved from your configured sources whenever new files are added to the Bookdrop folder. Please note that processing a large number of files simultaneously may increase the time required for metadata fetching.
autoDownload.enableLabel: Enable automatic metadata download for Bookdrop imports

persistence.sectionDesc: Configure how metadata is written to original files and how files are moved or renamed when metadata changes.
persistence.networkWarning: These features directly modify and move book files on disk (including rewriting metadata and renaming files). They are designed for local file systems only. Using them on NAS or cloud-backed storage is untested and may lead to file corruption, incomplete writes, or permanent data loss. Github issues related to network storage will not be supported.
persistence.unsupportedNote: Writing metadata is not supported for FB2, AZW3, and MOBI formats.
persistence.writeEpubDesc: Write metadata directly into EPUB files when editing book information.
persistence.writeCbxDesc: Write metadata directly into CBX files when editing book information.
persistence.writePdfDesc: Write metadata directly into PDF files when editing book information.
persistence.writePdfNote: PDFs do not support embedded covers. Only Title, Authors, Publisher, Categories, Description, Language, and Published Date can be updated.
persistence.writeAudiobookDesc: Write metadata directly into audiobook files (M4B, M4A, MP3, etc.) when editing book information.
persistence.writeAudiobookNote: Supports title, authors, narrator, description, publisher, categories, series, language, and cover art. For folder-based audiobooks, cover is saved as cover.jpg in the folder.
persistence.maxFileSizeTooltip: Only files up to this size will be updated. Larger files are ignored.
persistence.autoMoveDesc: Automatically move and rename files according to their library's naming pattern when metadata is updated.
persistence.sidecarDesc: Create external .metadata.json files alongside your books for portable metadata storage and backup.
persistence.enableSidecarDesc: Enable sidecar JSON metadata files. When enabled, metadata can be written to BookName.metadata.json files alongside your books.
persistence.writeOnUpdateDesc: Automatically update the sidecar JSON file whenever book metadata is edited.
persistence.writeOnScanDesc: Create sidecar JSON files when books are first added to the library during scanning.
persistence.includeCoverDesc: Also save the cover image as BookName.cover.jpg alongside the sidecar JSON file.

providers.sectionDesc: Configure which online sources to use for fetching book metadata. Enable providers and set up their API tokens or cookies to access richer book information.
providers.saveError: Failed to save metadata provider settings.
providers.cookieDesc: Providing your Amazon session cookie allows the app to access richer book metadata and bypass rate limits.
providers.googleApiDesc: Providing a Google Books API key increases rate limits and improves reliability.

fieldSelector.sectionTitle: Enabled Fields in Metadata Editor & Picker
fieldSelector.sectionDesc: Select which metadata fields to display when editing book information or picking metadata from providers. Disabled fields will be hidden from the interface.

publicReviews.sectionDesc: Configure automatic downloading of user reviews from external platforms. Reviews can be fetched from Amazon, Goodreads, and Hardcover for offline access.
publicReviews.autoDownloadDesc: Automatically fetch reviews when you open a book's details page. When disabled, reviews will only be downloaded manually or during metadata refresh.
publicReviews.reviewSourcesDesc: Configure which platforms to download reviews from and set limits for each source.
publicReviews.noProviders: No review sources available. Please ensure metadata providers are configured in the Provider Settings section above.

matchWeights.sectionDesc: Configure how important each metadata field is when computing match scores. Higher weights make fields more influential in determining the overall match quality.
matchWeights.recalculateDesc: Recomputes match scores for all books based on the latest weights.
matchWeights.recalcSuccess: All book match scores were recalculated successfully.
